content:
We have released a new version of the Java CQL Engine. The release is now syncing on the sonatype repositories.

This release includes a new interface for obfuscating PHI, some work towards full CQL 1.5 support, and numerous bug-fixes and performance enhancements. Full release notes are here:
https://github.com/DBCG/cql_engine/releases/tag/v1.5.2
